Description.Text: Perfect hotel for families for the type of construction and its location. 0508 FG

Dreamplace VILLA TAGORO is a charming village made for family dreams; situated in the residential area of Torviscas Alto; at a walking distance from a water park, it offers a free shuttle-bus service every 45 minutes to the nearby beaches and city centre. This typical Canarian style Village offers different swimming pools to enjoy the sunshine, a pool bar where you can get drinks, ice creams or snacks. And for a delicious gastronomic experience, the buffet restaurant offers different thematic meals every day, which will just delight your taste. If you are looking for fun, our entertainment team will make your holiday unforgettable by offering a wide diversity of activities. Villa Tagoro is a marvellous place to enjoy with your family and friends and to feel happy with the ones you care for!
